subdefinitions.definition: A companion in battle; fellow soldier .

definitions.definition: A fellow socialist , communist or other similarly politically aligned person.
examples: Hello, comrade . Are you going to the Communist Party meeting tonight?

definitions.definition: A non-hierarchical title, functionally similar to "Mr.", "Mrs.", "Miss", "Ms." etc, in a communist, socialist, or rarely in an Islamist state.
examples: Comrade Lenin inspired our people to undertake great works.

secondary_definitions: ( communism , by extension ) A fellow socialist , communist or other similarly politically aligned person. [from 1884]
( communism ) A non-hierarchical title, functionally similar to "Mr.", "Mrs.", "Miss", "Ms." etc, in a communist, socialist, or rarely in an Islamist state. [from 1884]
